thread.title: Vijay59 opening song lyrics on October 17
thread.title_full: Vijay59 opening song lyrics on October 17 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Vijay59 opening song lyrics on October 17
text:
Music composer GV Prakash has an update on his next project with Vijay. The musician, who is composing for Vijay59 says that he will reveal the lyrics for the opening song in the film on October 17. He posted on his micro-blogging page, "#GV50 update on oct 17th ! Will reveal ilayathalapathys opening song lyric ... #ulagalocaltharaticket !! Semma dance by VJsir saw visuals!"
Interestingly, this is the 50th film for GV Prakash as a composer. The shoot for the film is on in full swing and at least 70 per cent of the shoot has already been wrapped up.
